mapper.select: SELECT m.*, mgjg.genreId, mgjg.genreName, mpjp.personId, mpjp.personName, mpjp.personPosition FROM movies m LEFT JOIN (SELECT mg.movieId, g.genreId, g.genreName FROM movieGenre mg JOIN genre g ON mg.genreId=g.genreId) mgjg ON m.movieId=mgjg.movieId LEFT JOIN (SELECT mp.movieId, p.personId, p.personName, p.personPosition FROM moviePeople mp JOIN people p ON mp.personId=p.personId) mpjp ON m.movieId=mpjp.movieId WHERE m.movieTitle like CONCAT('%',#{movieTitle},'%');
